name: 9 Nights in Sunny Land | GMTK 2020
description:
Hi there!

Thank you for checking out our GMTK 2020 game jam submission. The theme for GMTK 2020 was "Out of Control."  

9 Nights in Sunny Land is a puzzle platformer where you are tasked with defending the local Fox villagers from yourself. Each night, you turn into a bloodthirsty werewolf. Can you save every villager from yourself? Will you find a way to contain your blood thirst fully? Play to find out!

Creating a game like this in just 48 hours was such a fun experience! This is our first ever game jam, so we're not surprised with all of the bugs. We were surprised at how fast 48 hours can go! 

All art and music were obtained through asset packages. All programming took place during the 48-hour game jam window. 

Thanks for playing!
